contents:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The orders in each of the above captioned appeals are vacated and the cases are remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Lycoming County for consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Levesque, 469 Pa. 118, 364 A.2d 932 (1976). See also, Commonwealth v. Guerry, 469 Pa. 20, 364 A.2d 700 (1976).
